text: he hamaare paalanahaar! hamane ek[1] pukaarane vaale ko eemaan ke lie pukaarate hue suna ki apane paalanahaar par eemaan lao, to ham eemaan le aaye. he hamaare paalanahaar! hamaare paap kshama kar de tatha hamaaree buraeeyon ko anadekhee kar de tatha hamaaree maut puneeton (sadaachaariyon) ke saath ho
